children.value: Bounties are small to medium tasks that need help. They mostly cover work related to this site. You can earn Dai by completing bounties.
We manage the bounty process through Github issues and project boards.
Collaborators will review your drafts and early iterations in Google Docs.
Final site content is written in markdown.
Learn about Maker. The community has created plenty of reading material.
Take a look at the projects we have:
Get started with work in four steps.
Get assigned an Adviser from the community to help.
To learn more about the contribution process, see
Earn up to 500 Dai for a bounty. We’ll discuss payment details with you after interest has been expressed.
Ask in the community chat for help submitting an invoice.
We welcome all ideas to improve this site or the Maker community. Submit a proposal for up to 5,000 Dai in funding.
See what’s expected for working on a Maker community bounty.
